de.agilecoders.wicket.less

Class LessResourceReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wicket.request.resource.ResourceReference
      • org.apache.wicket.request.resource.PackageResourceReference
        • org.apache.wicket.request.resource.CssResourceReference
          • de.agilecoders.wicket.less.LessResourceReference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LessCompilable, Serializable, org.apache.wicket.util.io.IClusterable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BootstrapCssReference, BootstrapResponsiveCssReference

    public abstract class LessResourceReference
extends org.apache.wicket.request.resource.CssResourceReference
implements LessCompilable
    Static resource reference for css resources. The resources are filtered (stripped comments and whitespace) if there is registered compressor.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    miha
    See Also:
    IResourceSettings.getCssCompressor(), Serialized Form

      • storeCompiledLess

        public void storeCompiledLess(byte[] content)
                       throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: LessCompilable
        This method is called after the less/css content was generated. But only if BootstrapLessCompilerSettings.storeChanges() is set to true and there are changes inside the less/css files.
        Specified by:
        storeCompiledLess in interface LessCompilable
        Parameters:
        content - The css content as byte array.
        Throws:
        IOException - if content can't be stored.
